artworks.title: Urban Reflections
artworks.description: A vibrant abstract expressionist piece showcasing the artist's signature Mediterranean-influenced style.

artworks.title: Pacific Intersection
artworks.description: A striking photograph capturing the meeting point of Vancouver's urban architecture with its natural surroundings.

artworks.title: Heritage Fusion

artworks.title: Recycled Dreams
artworks.description: A large-scale installation created entirely from recycled materials, commenting on environmental sustainability.
